Class Nim

java.lang.Object
Nim
public class Nim extends Object
This class uses both the Piles and the various Player classes to simulate the Nims game
Version:
1
Author:
TA's

    Moves along the game, using the takeTurn method and so on, to help the game go along.
    void
    swapPlayers()
    Swaps the players positions, depending on whose turn it is
    void
    takeTurn()
    Gets the next move from the current player and then applies that move to the corresponding piles However, if the move is illegal then the current play is notified and will have to enter another move Repeats until a valid move is entered.

      p2 - Player 2

    • takeTurn

      public void takeTurn()
      Gets the next move from the current player and then applies that move to the corresponding piles However, if the move is illegal then the current play is notified and will have to enter another move Repeats until a valid move is entered.

    • checkGameOver

      public void checkGameOver()
      Checks if piles is empty, if so then game is over, and assigned players to winner or loser

    • swapPlayers

      public void swapPlayers()
      Swaps the players positions, depending on whose turn it is

    • play

      public void play()
      Moves along the game, using the takeTurn method and so on, to help the game go along.
